xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1039963-Black Hole Space Debt 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xDyeC5eWFFAB2M2rEj2pxeGxb61.jpg A 16mm film about how to make your own optical soundtrack, it is also a playful film about space exploration. As the film progresses, the nature of the soundtrack comes to speak for the way space exploration is part of a larger, systemic repetition of colonialism. The film is purposefully queer, handmade and anti-illusionist as a means of deconstructing established narrative conventions and audience expectations. Black Hole Space Debt
